diagrams.description: A comprehensive flowchart illustrating the speech-language therapy process, from initial screening through assessment (speech, language, and related areas), diagnosis, evidence-based treatment planning and implementation, progress monitoring with decision points, and discharge planning for communication disorders.

disorder suspected?} A1 -->|No| A2[Provide resources

- Social interaction
